AltName.entry: SPECIAL NEEDS INCLUSION PLAYCARE SERVICE - CYPD

Desc.entry: A City Council service for children and young people who have a brother or sister with a disability. Participants have the opportunity to attend a 12 week therapeutic course with other siblings. The course tackles the emotional issues for siblings and provides empowerment strategies to improve general mental health. Additionally, group reunions are run regularly throughout the year enabling participants to keep in touch and take part in leisure and recreational opportunities together.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Groups start in September, January and April
